Package toy.das.atomicBroadcast

Class RBrodcastService

  • java.lang.Object
    • bftsmart.tom.server.defaultservices.DefaultSingleRecoverable
      • toy.das.atomicBroadcast.RBrodcastService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bftsmart.tom.server.Executable, bftsmart.tom.server.Recoverable, bftsmart.tom.server.SingleExecutable
    public class RBrodcastService
extends bftsmart.tom.server.defaultservices.DefaultSingleRecoverable
    This class implements an Atomic Broadcast abstraction based on bft-SMaRt.

        public RBrodcastService​(int channels,
                        int id,
                        java.lang.String configHome)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        channels - the number of channels in the system (with a single Toy group this is always 1)
        id - the server id
        configHome - a path to bft-SMaRt configuration directory

      • deliver

        public byte[] deliver​(int channel)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Atomic Deliver the first message of a given channel. Note that this is a blocking call.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to which we need to deliver the message (with a single Toy group this is always 0)
        Returns:
        the delivered message
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • broadcast

        public int broadcast​(byte[] m,
                     int channel,
                     int id)
        Atomic Broadcast a message to the whole network.
        Parameters:
        m - the message to broadcast
        channel - the broadcaster channel (with a single Toy group this is always 0)
        id - the broadcaster id
        Returns:
        the serial id of the Atomic Broadcast action
